meanings.definition: In a crazy or eccentric manner.
meanings.sent1: She danced nuttily around the room, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: The clown performed nuttily at the circus, entertaining the audience.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel nuttily chased its own tail in the park.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled nuttily through the trees, creating an eerie atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The old clock ticked nuttily, as if it had a mind of its own.

meanings.definition: Characterized by odd or unusual behavior.
meanings.sent1: His nuttily colored socks always stood out in a crowd.
meanings.sent2: The professor had a nuttily brilliant idea that surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave me a nuttily curious look when I meowed back at it.
meanings.sent4: The house on the hill had a nuttily crooked roof, adding to its charm.
meanings.sent5: Her nuttily decorated room was a reflection of her unique personality.
